{{Description|The primitive wandering inhabitants of Teyvat's wildernesses.<br />Ill-tempered warriors for their tribes, they are simple-minded believers in the power of brute force. If their muscles grow strong enough and their strength great enough, then one day they too shall raise up a great shield and become a [[mitachurl]]... Or will they?|[[Archive]]}}
{{Enemy Intro|hidegroup=1}}

==Drops==
{{Drops|Hilichurls}}

==Stats==
{{Enemy Stats|hp_ratio=1|atk_ratio=1.8|hp_type=1}}

==Abilities and Attacks==
*'''Smack:''' Swings its club at the player once, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
*'''Charged Smack:''' Charges and swings its club at the player powerfully, dealing '''200% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and knocking the player back.
*'''Rapid Swings:''' Performs 3 consecutive swings at the player, dealing '''100% ATK''', '''100% ATK''', '''125% ATK''' with each swing as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
*'''Punch:''' Approaches and swings its fist at the player, dealing '''75% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. This attack is only used if the Hilichurl Fighter's club is destroyed.
*'''Rock Throw:''' Digs a small rock out of the ground and throws it at the player, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. This attack is only used if the Hilichurl Fighter's club is destroyed.
